title: AI Review Kit Review Output Schema (review_v1)
description: Standard structure for the output of a review skill.

issue.description: Description of the problem or issue identified by the skill.

rationale.description: Explanation of why this issue matters and the reasoning behind its identification.

impact.description: Potential impact or consequences if the issue is left unresolved.

suggestion.description: Recommended action or refactoring to address the identified issue.

priority.description: Priority level indicating the urgency with which the issue should be addressed (P0 is highest).

skill_id.description: Identifier of the skill that produced this review output.
